alert.note: Alert for Garfield (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 19 at 5:50PM MDT until July 19 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...THE FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM MDT FOR CENTRAL GARFIELD COUNTY... At 549 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. 0.75 to 1.25 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Heavy rain producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of normally dry washes, creeks and streams. Flash flooding will remain over mainly rural areas of central Garfield County. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Remain alert for flooding even in locations not receiving rain. Normally dry washes, streams, and rivers can become raging killer currents in a matter of minutes, even from distant rainfall.
